item.description:
Event: Enjoy a fun evening of swing dancing at the Armenian Cultural Center in Watertown. The dances are designed for people of all ages and abilities. A lesson for beginners starts at 7:45 p.m. The band plays from 8:30 p.m. to 11:30 p.m. You can bring your own beverage or buy one at the dance. Dress in comfortable, casual clothing. For more information visit: www.bostonswingdance.com.

Event's Host: Ron Budd

Meet: 7:45 p.m. at the Armenian Cultural Center, 47 Nichols Ave., Watertown, Mass. 02472

RSVP: Try to RSVP by Sat, Feb 2nd or just show-and-go!

Cost: There is a $15.00 admission fee, $10.00 with a student I.D. and $5 for members from Meetup that can be credited towards a full Mosaic membership ($25).
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP for the details and the directions

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Enjoy an evening of Swing Dancing
